DOC.brief_summary: Many author have exposed the rapid and slow expansion, the diversity of activation and containment protocols and the follow-up time, justify the need for more studies to evaluate the effects to the ERM for the long-term.
DOC.brief_title: One Year Skeletal and Dental Arch Changes Following Rapid Maxillary Expansion Treatment in Children
DOC.criteria: crossbite with maxillary atresia patients had undergone orthodontic treatment or had a syndrome
